~~NOTOC~~

====== libxfce4util - Utility sharing library ======

Libxfce4util is used to share commonly used non-GTK+ utilities among the Xfce applications.

===== Latest Release ===== {{rss>https://archive.xfce.org/feeds/project/libxfce4util 1 date description 2h}}

[[https://archive.xfce.org/src/xfce/libxfce4util|Releases]]

[[|Back to Top]]

===== Source Code Repository ===== [[https://gitlab.xfce.org/xfce/libxfce4util|]]
